ingredients.ingredient: 1 (270 g) tub PHILADELPHIA Herb & Garlic Cooking Creme Cream Cheese Product

cookingTips: Whisk cream cheese with broth gradually to achieve a smooth, lump-free sauce
Stir in mustard at the end to preserve its sharp, tangy flavor
Cook salmon separately and serve with sauce drizzled on top for better texture control
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook to build a velvety, restaurant-quality mustard cream sauce using convenient cream cheese products.
